channel.title: Comments on: Showing sysjobhistory run_duration in HHMMSS format
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Verena
item.dc:creator: Verena
item.description:
Thanks for the function, I had never heard of STUFF, I like it!
Here is the following to use in your select and display it:
STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(6),run_duration),6 ),3,0,':'),6,0,':') AS Time_Elapsed,
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the function, I had never heard of STUFF, I like it!

Here is the following to use in your select and display it:

STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT(‘000000′ + CONVERT(VARCHAR(6),run_duration),6 ),3,0,’:’),6,0,’:’) AS Time_Elapsed,
